item.title: Kubernetes
item.description: Kubernetes is two things A cluster for running applications An orchestrator of cloud-native microservices apps Kubernetes cluster ![[Pasted image 20240312073714.png]] A Kubernetes cluster contains six main components: API server: Exposes a REST interface to all Kubernetes resources. Serves as the front end of the Kubernetes control plane. Scheduler: Places containers according to resource requirements and metrics. Makes note of Pods with no assigned node, and selects nodes for them to run on.
